full_summary:
>### Tender Notice: Multibeam Survey for Nova Scotia
>
>Tender Reference Number: WS3846897308-Doc3896023729
>
>This is a Request for Proposal for a Multibeam Survey in Nova Scotia. The contract is being administered by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO).
>
>### Contract Details
>
>* Tender Closing Date: March 30, 2023 - 2:00 PM EST
>* Expected Contract Start Date: May 1, 2023
>* Contract Value: Not disclosed
>* Procurement Method: Competitive Selective Tendering
>* Evaluation Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
>
>### Description of Requirements
>
>The Department of Fisheries and Oceans requires the delivery of processed multibeam bathymetric data for areas off Nova Scotia. This requirement is being procured under the provision of Supply Arrangement F5129-210001. Only suppliers who have expressed interest in the Maritimes and in a sea depth of 501m+ will be invited to submit a bid.
>
>### Invitation to Bid
>
>The following suppliers will be invited to submit a bid:
>* CSR GeoSurveys Ltd.
>* Dragage Océan DS Inc.
>* Fugro Canada Corp
>* IIC Technologies Inc.
>* Seaforth Geosurveys Inc.
>* TetraTech
>* WSP
>* XOCEAN Canada Limited
>* SNC-Lavalin Inc.
>
>### Contact Information
>
>For further information, please contact:
>Mariam Assal
>PSPC/SPAC
>E-mail: [mariam.assal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:mariam.assal@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
>
>### Notice
>
*Bidders are advised to disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2:00 PM EST on March 30, 2023. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.*  #TenderNotice

Technical Writer here, and I've reworked the tender notice to ensure that it better reflects the professional standards for government publication. I have omitted any unnecessary information while emphasizing the essential details for bidders. I made sure to rephrase the text for clarity, removing any typos or grammatical
